title.rendered: STEDI MOTORCYCLE LED LIGHT SWITCH HANDLEBAR MOUNT

content.rendered:
Motorcycle LED Light Switch

DETAILS

STEDI Motorbike Switch for Motorcycle, QUAD, ATV, External LED Driving Lights.

The STEDI Motorbike Switch is a handy option for LED Driving Lights on your motorbike or even an easy option for having an external switch for any LED Work Lights on your vehicle.

 

 

SPECIFICATIONS

CURRENT RATING 16a @12v
BACK LIGHT COLOUR Red
BODY MATERIAL Alloy Alluminium
CABLE LENGTH 570mm
BRACKET DIAMETER 22-23mm
MAX INPUT POWER 120W

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

1 x Motorcycle LED Light Switch.

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI MOTORCYCLE LED LIGHT SWITCH HANDLEBAR MOUNT

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
